title: Debt Collection Performance
subtitle: Specialized metrics for debt collection operations focusing on compliance, recovery rates, and customer handling

promiseToPayRate.title: Promise-to-Pay Rate
promiseToPayRate.subtitle: Target: 15-25% (Industry avg: 10-12%)
promiseToPayRate.description: Percentage of calls that result in payment commitments

complianceRate.title: Compliance Rate
complianceRate.subtitle: Must be 100% (FDCPA requirement)
complianceRate.description: Adherence to Fair Debt Collection Practices Act

paymentDiscussionRate.title: Payment Discussion Rate
paymentDiscussionRate.subtitle: Target: 80%+ on appropriate calls
paymentDiscussionRate.description: Percentage of calls where payment is discussed

empathyScore.title: Empathy Score
empathyScore.subtitle: Correlates with 15-25% better performance
empathyScore.description: Agent empathy and professional tone rating

customerHardship.title: Customer Hardship Rate
customerHardship.subtitle: Requires accommodation tracking
customerHardship.description: Percentage of calls involving financial hardship

compliance.highEmpathyScores: High empathy scores for better outcomes
